item.title: Creedence Clearwater Revival - Up Around The Bend
Creedence Clearwater Revival - Bad Moon Rising
item.description:
Just G, D, and A!
Check out the website for the ukulele jam sessions I run via Fredonia Ukulele: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.edu/fredonia-ukulele/

item.title: Creedence Clearwater Revival - Down On The Corner
item.description:
Chords: C F G Strumming: demonstration of 4 different strums Picking: Optional picking melody with demonstration Includes a break down of the ukulele tab explained
Basic Strum: 00:14 Intermediate Strum: 00:24 Advanced Strum: 00:35 Really Advanced Strum: 00:48 Tablature explained: 1:04 Picking pattern demo: 1:24 Song begins: 2:29
I do not own the copyright to this music.
